title.value: Повышение продуктивности и качества льна масличного с помощью брассиностероидов
Common flax productivity and quality increase by brassinosteroides

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Gavlyushin, I.Yu., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Flax

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented results of the field trials for 2010-2012 with oil flax (Linum usitatissimum) variety Brest. The possibility of two-way use of the crop in the north-eastern part of Belarus as the seminal purpose, and for technical fiber was given. There was marked high-efficiency of the national brassinosteroid phytohormones in increasing yielding capacity, product quality, and reduction of crop infestation with calcium chlorosis. The results of research were supported by economic calculations. It was found that the most effective treatment of flax crops was with the double application of brassinosteroids: application to the background N40P60K90 (AFC complex fertilizer) or epibrassinolide or homobrassinolide with foliar treatment of crops in the early phase with a tank-mixture with herbicides and complex Z and B 'A Polycom' and foliar fertilizing of crops with plant growth regulators at budding phase in tank mix with a fungicide Derozan, KS. As a result in curse of 3 years the average seed yield was over 19,9-21,4 kg / ha, yield increase due to brassinosteroids - 4,3-5,8 t / ha with profitability of 209-218 %. Under the influence of brassinosteroids in 1,8-6,4 times decreased crop infestation with calcium chlorosis .
